search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/ThreatHunting/saved/searches | search title="[T*]*" | rex field=search "mitre_technique_id=\"(?<id>[^\.]*)\"" | stats dc(id) AS Searches by id | sort id | table id

| makeresults | eval input_host_fqdn = COALESCE(if(trim("$host_fqdn$")="", "*", trim("$host_fqdn$")), "*") | eval input_event_type = COALESCE(if(trim("$event_type$")="", "*", trim("$event_type$")), "*") | eval input_mitre_technique_id = COALESCE(if(trim("$mitre_technique_id$")="", "*", trim("$mitre_technique_id$")), "*") | eval input_process_name = COALESCE(if(trim("$process_name$")="", "*", trim("$process_name$")), "*") | eval input_target_process_path = COALESCE(if(trim("$target_process_path$")="", "*", trim("$target_process_path$")), "*") | eval input_target_process_address = COALESCE(if(trim("$target_process_address$")="", "*", trim("$target_process_address$")), "*")
| eval host_fqdn = input_host_fqdn | eval event_type = input_event_type | eval mitre_technique_id = input_mitre_technique_id | eval process_name = input_process_name | eval target_process_path = input_target_process_path | eval target_process_address = input_target_process_address | eval reason = trim("$input_reason$") | eval added_date = strftime(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") | eval contact = ("$env:user$") | table * | fields - _raw _time | where reason!="CHANGEME"
| inputlookup append=t threathunting_remote_thread_whitelist.csv | sort -added_date | dedup mitre_technique_id host_fqdn event_type process_name target_process_path target_process_address
| eval mode = "$input_mode$" | eval delete=if(mode="delete" and mitre_technique_id=input_mitre_technique_id and host_fqdn=input_host_fqdn and event_type=input_event_type and process_name=input_process_name and target_process_path=input_target_process_path and target_process_address=input_target_process_address, "yes", "no") | where delete="no" | fields - delete mode | fields - input_host_fqdn input_event_type input_mitre_technique_id input_process_name input_target_process_path input_target_process_address | outputlookup threathunting_remote_thread_whitelist.csv | fields added_date contact mitre_technique_id reason host_fqdn event_type process_name target_process_path target_process_address
| inputlookup threathunting_remote_thread_whitelist.csv | sort -added_datetime | fields added_date contact mitre_technique_id reason host_fqdn event_type process_name target_process_path
